name: requestsdebugger
description: Tool to debug failed/dropped requests at client side

scripts.build:mac: npm install; ./node_modules/pkg/lib-es5/bin.js -t node4-macos-x64 src/requestsDebugger.js; mv requestsDebugger RequestsDebugger-Mac
scripts.build:linux-x86: npm install; ./node_modules/pkg/lib-es5/bin.js -t node4-linux-x86 src/requestsDebugger.js; mv requestsDebugger RequestsDebugger-Linux-x86
scripts.build:linux-x64: npm install; ./node_modules/pkg/lib-es5/bin.js -t node4-linux-x64 src/requestsDebugger.js; mv requestsDebugger RequestsDebugger-Linux-x64
scripts.build:linux: npm run build:linux-x86; npm run build:linux-x64
scripts.build:win: npm install; ./node_modules/pkg/lib-es5/bin.js -t node4-win-x86 src/requestsDebugger.js; mv requestsDebugger.exe RequestsDebugger.exe
